item.title: Welcome to Philosophy 20C
item.description:
This is the official class website for Philosophy 20C - History of Philosophy (Empiricists to Kant).

Since the course instructor and the class TA will be posting updates, messages and assignments on this website regularly, it would be a good idea for all students enrolled in Phil 20C to check the website frequently.

A list of helpful class links (email, info, lecture notes, resources, etc) is located in the right hand column of this website. Please feel free to contact the Philosophy Department webmaster if there are any problems with the website. Thanks.

Sincerely, Joseph Lee
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (UCSB Philosophy)
